version_description:
-general gameplay improvement
-bug fixes
-5 cameras view ("far camera" is back!)
-aerodynamic setup on pit stop
-option to force dry race

-general gameplay improvement
-bug fixes
-5 cameras view ("far camera" is back!)
-aerodynamic setup on pit stop
-option to force dry race

-now the AI also performs pit stops, like the player
-updated the power level of the engines of the various manufacturers
-option to change the sound of the engine (three different types)
-bug fixes
-small updates to the graphics

-engine power level adjust option
-free tires selection in every race
-graphic update
-bug fixes
